roasts.name: First Landing
roasts.tasting_notes: Tart! Sweet, fruity, satisfying milk chocolate long finish. Complex cherry attack with a mild chocolate finish. Great contrast after weeks of darker rosdted chocolate bombs.

roasts.name: Kanzu Lot 7, Rwanda
roasts.tasting_notes: outstanding, could not be better. sweet honey, graham crackers, toast. baking spices. incredibly satisfying.
